text: Happy Thanksgiving, everyone!!! Last week, I told you that we were working on a project connecting artists, art lovers, and organizations that do real social good. Today, we launched a site announcing our mission and inviting artists to participate. We are amateurs to be sure, but we are scrappy and ambitious. More than 30 terrific artists have come forward and said fuck yeah. Now here is where I say what I’m thankful for. I’m thankful for support and enthusiasm that has been shown. I especially want to call out <@U0ML49XU0>, who listened enthusiastically and offered encouragement and advice. Here’s the thing: <http://raadepartment.com/> More to come.

attachments.title: RAAD
attachments.text: Radical Activation of the Art Department—an open, safe space for creative engagement and progressive action.

text: Dude. This. Big time. Way to go!
